text: The 1953 Tour de Hongrie was the 15th edition of the Tour de Hongrie cycle race and was held from 6 to 10 September 1953. The race started and finished in Budapest. The race was won by József Kis-Dala. ==Route== {| class="wikitable" |+ Stages of the 1953 Tour de Hongrie |- ! scope="col" | Stage ! scope="col" | Date ! scope="col" | Route ! scope="col" | Distance ! scope="col" | Winner |- ! scope="col" | 1 | style="text-align:right;" | 6 September | Budapest to Szombathely | | |- ! scope="col" | 2 | style="text- align:right;" | 7 September | Szombathely to Keszthely | | |- ! scope="col" | 3 | style="text-align:right;" | 8 September | Keszthely to Keszthely | | |- ! scope="col" | 4 | style="text-align:right;" | 9 September | Keszthely to Pécs | | |- ! scope="col" | 5 | style="text-align:right;" | 10 September | Pécs to Budapest | | |- | colspan="3" style="text-align:center" | Total | colspan="2" style="text-align:center" | '''''' |} ==General classification== {| |Final general classification {| class="wikitable" |- ! scope="col" | Rank ! scope="col" | Rider ! scope="col" | Team ! scope="col" | Time |- | style="text-align:center;" | 1 | | Dózsa | style="text-align:right;" | |- | style="text-align:center;" | 2 | | Honvéd | style="text-align:right;" | + 9' 26" |- | style="text-align:center;" | 3 | | Vörös Lobogó | style="text- align:right;" | + 11' 36" |} |} ==References== 1953 Tour de Hongrie Tour de Hongrie
